name: people.preferences
description: A People object is public by default, but portions of it can be set to private by modifying its preferences

api_endpoints.description: GET: List of People Preference options using optional 'search' parameter
PATCH: overwrite People Preference when found in request body

key_value_pairs.show_email: show/hide email in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_eppn: show/hide eppn in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_profile: show/hide profile in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_publications: show/hide publications in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_roles: show/hide roles in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_sshkeys: show/hide sshkeys in all interfaces (default: True)
